participant_1.name: Nisha
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Nisha enjoys art and music as a way to connect with her emotions and the world around her.
participant_1.background: I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday. I love sushi. I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete. I visit India often. I like to draw and paint because it helps me express myself.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Caring and supportive, Raj finds joy in helping others through tutoring and values relaxation and personal time.
participant_2.background: I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things. I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself. I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. My parents are still married.

content.text: Hello there! How are you?
Doing great! Thanks for asking!
Awesome! I'm just hanging out, listening to music.
That sounds like a great way to relax. What are you listening to?
I'm listening to my favorite songs from India. I love the music there!
Oh, that sounds really cool! I've never been to India, but I've heard the music is beautiful.
It is! I especially love the Bollywood music.
I've heard of that! It sounds really interesting.
It is! I'm actually planning a trip to India next year.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw and paint. It helps me express myself.
That's great! I love to draw and paint too!
Oh, really? What kind of stuff do you like to draw?
I like to draw people and animals.
That's cool! I like to draw people and landscapes.
Nice! I think it's so cool that we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we could be great friends.
Yeah, I think so too
